items.content_html: I’ve been exploring genealogy again and‚Ä¶ I think I may have found my maternal great grandfather’s Italian birth certificate‚Äîit’s in Italian of course so I could be reading it wrong, but it seems to match both his date of birth and parent’s names.

items.content_html:
The Raleigh iOS developer meetup I started in 2011 is in need of an organizer again. I miss running that group but not sure what it would be any more. I wish someone had a vision for it, sad to see it really end üò¢.

Also why is meetup.com so expensive!?

items.content_html: If you add a white matte style border around photos when you post them to social media‚Ä¶ I’m curious why? I see it a lot and wonder if it helps people see the photo better or something. It just seems weird to me‚Äîbut maybe mildly skeuomorphic‚Äîto have a white matte on a social media post.
items.content_text: If you add a white matte style border around photos when you post them to social media‚Ä¶ I'm curious why? I see it a lot and wonder if it helps people see the photo better or something. It just seems weird to me‚Äîbut maybe mildly skeuomorphic‚Äîto have a white matte on a social media post.

I think I got it right! So good.

items.content_html: New eBike! Took our first ride today around Falls Lake Dam. It’s a Magnum Navigator S with step-through frame which really helps with my bad knees. Really like this bike and can’t wait to put it on the van and ride around campsites!

items.content_html: I watched 99 movies in 2022. Including rewatching all the Mission: Impossible and Lord of the Rings movies. Enjoyed a lot of them but some of my favorites were “Everything Everywhere All at Once”, “Weird: The Al Yankovic Story”, and “RRR”.
items.content_text: I watched 99 movies in 2022. Including rewatching all the Mission: Impossible and Lord of the Rings movies. Enjoyed a lot of them but some of my favorites were "Everything Everywhere All at Once", "Weird: The Al Yankovic Story", and "RRR".
